entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-11-04
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Regression in connections creation performance #61233
  • NativeAOT in .NET 7 #61231
  • [HTTP/2] Memory usage while reading from long running response streams #61223
  • No SerializeAsync in System.Text.Json.JsonSerializer #61221
  • Mono build failure: Could not resolve type 'System.Threading.AutoreleasePool' #61218
  • Pin FileVersions in platform manifest for the ref packs in the servicing #61216
    6.0.x
  • Unrolled Vector128<T>.Count doesn't elide bounds check #61207
  • Regression in Microsoft.Extensions.Configuration.Binder in DotNet 6 RC2 #61202
  • Visual Studio 2019 is crashing when trying to load a solution with System.AccessViolationException #61200
  • Blazor Web Assembly build failed .Net 6 RC1 MONO_PATH doesn't exist or has wrong permissions #61227
  • Decode content-disposition header #61197
  • use System.Drawing.Common.Bitmap.GetPixel got RGB data but the result is different from PS #61195
  • Regressions in System.Collections.CreateAddAndRemove<String> #61214
    7.0.0
  • Regressions in System.Collections.CopyTo<String> #61213
  • wasm InvokeJS return value is broken #61192
  • Don't generate guarded devirtualization for abstract classes #61190
    7.0.0

Closed

  • X509Certificate.CreateFromSignedFile fails on Linux with ASN1 corrupted data #61092
  • Some MethodInfo(s) of array types loaded by MetadataLoadContext are incorrectly evaluated as equal. #57728
    7.0.0
  • ReadyToRun, PublishSingleFile=true, net 5.0 / 6.0 leaves native dlls out of bundle container #61120
  • .NET 6.0 blazor wasm project reports an incorrect type #61007
    6.0.x
  • TimeZoneInfo.DisplayName is inconsistent between Linux and Windows #61210
    Future
  • During Json Serialization of a 2d array, JsonIgnore attribute not being checked before data type support validation #61205
  • SslStream.Read behavior changes #61115
  • Content-Disposition encoding non-ASCII characters #61183
    7.0.0
  • can't parse french dates in alpine docker image while ok in focal #61166
  • [API Proposal]: Add `new()` for `TProxy` Parameter for `DispatchProxy.Create` #61206

PullRequests

Created

  • Simplify minterm generation in Regex NonBacktracking engine #61232
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions
  • Add Enumerable.Concat & Enumerable.Flatten methods #61230
    area-System.Linq, new-api-needs-documentation, 7.0.0
  • Fix build options for native test lib to not enable avx-512 #61229
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Use the Xunit assert library instead of CoreCLRTestLibrary for most asserts #61226
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • WIP: using Jeremy's Roslyn generator to prototype the test migration process #61224
  • JIT: Fold "shift-by-zero" in lower #61222
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Start tracking debug info for inlined statements #61220
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Update docker image #61217
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Use conditional statement instead of switch in System.Linq.Enumerable #61215
    area-System.Linq, community-contribution
  • [wasm] Revert back to eval in wasm InvokeJS with modularization support . #61212
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 7.0.0
  • Add tests for CNG key algorithm mismatches #61211
    area-System.Security, community-contribution
  • Enable global constant propagation for `GT_LCL_FLD` #61209
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Make JitPrintInlinedMethods less verbose #61208
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/5.0] accept empty realm for digest auth (#56369) #61203
    * NO MERGE *, Servicing-approved, area-System.Net, 5.0.13
  • fix unexpected TimeSeriesLimitReached after HistogramLimitReached(#60752) #61199
    area-System.Diagnostics.Tracing, community-contribution
  • Add 'w' and 's' bit to xarch instruction flags. #61198
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • issue-22928 Add ImmutableArray Span-based APIs #61196
    area-System.Collections, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Create superpmi-asmdiffs pipeline #61194
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix incorrect CCW decoding in GetObjectForCCW #61193
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • JIT: don't bother with GDV for an abstract class #61191
    area-CodeGen-coreclr

Merged

  • Fold S.S.C.Encoding into new System.Security.Cryptography library #61137
    area-System.Security, 7.0.0
  • [DllImportGenerator] Use ElementMarshallingGeneratorFactory to create the marshalling generator for collection elements #61219
    area-Interop-coreclr
  • Use constant ids for RoArrayType GetMethodsCore #61177
    area-System.Reflection.Metadata
  • improved BDD Unicode table representation in NonBacktracking engine #61142
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions
  • [mono][interp] Fix GetType called on ptr constrained to Nullable` #61020
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • [release/5.0] Add pull request template for 5.0 to point to the servicing docs #60414
    * NO MERGE *, area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Change hosted pool #57785
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Update branding for 5.0.13 #61111
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Applied @marek-safar review to exit the loop once the condition is fulfilled. #61165
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • Fix Assertion failed 'ins == INS_add' for madd/msub #61171
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Set IL offsets for calls created during devirtualization #61189
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [arm64] JIT: Recognize sbfiz/ubfiz idioms #61045
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • [DllImportGenerator] Fix stub generation for char array marshalling #61188
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, 7.0.0

Updated

  • Request CachePolicy isn't applied in HTTP request header #60913
    area-System.Net, community-contribution
  • Convert to OleDb assembly and last Cryptography DllImport to GeneratedDllImport #61184
    area-System.Data.OleDB, 7.0.0
  • Optimize FMA codegen base on the overwritten #58196
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • 1388 xml serializer assembly load context awareness #58932
    area-Serialization, 6.0.0
  • Fix FileSystemAclExtensions.Create when passing a null FileSecurity #59389
    area-System.IO, new-api-needs-documentation, 7.0.0
  • [release/6.0][wasm] Change dotnet.wasm link optimization #60632
    Servicing-approved, arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, 6.0.1
  • Added AsReadOnly extension methods for IDictionary<T, U> and IList<T> #61172
    area-System.Collections, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • [release/6.0.1] add support for macOS 12 #61028
    Servicing-approved, area-Host, 6.0.1
  • [wasm] Add test for blazor/sdk fix for lazy loaded assemblies #60673
    arch-wasm
  • Apply BuiltInComInterop feature switch to managed code #54056
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices
  • [tests][mobile] Enable diagnostic_tracing for mobile runtime tests #60879
  • [release/6.0] Allow nfloat to be in the ObjCRuntime namespace, and make it work for Xamarin.MacCatalyst.dll as well. #60861
    Servicing-consider, area-Interop-mono, os-maccatalyst, 6.0.1
  • [wasm] Add console version of browser-bench sample #60733
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Update branding to 6.0.1 #61176
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Fix x86 stackwalk for UnmanagedCallersOnly #61075
    area-VM-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Cache LastAccessed during MemoryCache compaction #61187
    area-Extensions-Caching
  • Clean-up CacheEntry #59110
    area-Extensions-Caching, community-contribution
  • Make intrinsic nodes multi op (aka delete `GT_LIST`) #59912
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • removed argument requestId from loopbackserver.cs #58678
    area-System.Net
  • SetCreationTime, SetLastAccessTime, SetLastWriteTime Should not open a new stream to obtain a SafeFileHandle #60507
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • XARCH: Remove redudant tests for GT_LT/GT_GE relops. #61152
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • FileSystem.Unix: improve CopyFile. #59695
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • Clean up the documentation for the library testing #59401
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Remove BestFitMapping, CallingConvention, and ThrowOnUnmappableChar from GeneratedDllImportAttribute #61182
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, 7.0.0
  • JIT: slightly more aggressive tail duplication #61179
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [SUPER DRAFT] New API for invoking JS functions from C# #60765
    arch-wasm
  • Fixed ILVerify incorrectly flagging valid default interface implementations #61185
    area-ILVerification, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Wasm marshaler API for user-defined types; migrate Uri and DateTime to new API #47640
    * NO MERGE *, arch-wasm, area-Interop-mono

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-11-04
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Build failed: Validate-DotNet/main sdk, .NET 6.0.2xx SDK, validation-sdk-.NET 6.0.2xx SDK #sdk-117260-.NET6.0.2xxSDK #22478
  • When there are a certain number of controls in WinForm project, vs cannot load pdb file for breakpoint debugging.(.NetFramework4.0) #22461

Closed

  • Implicit architecture targeting not in place for `dotnet tool install` #21660
    6.0.2xx
  • Re-enable tests failing due to failure to load System.Linq, Version=4.2.1.0 #9607
    7.0.1xx
  • Enable test Inbox_version_of_assembly_is_loaded_over_applocal_version once framework deps.json has runtime file versions #2124
    7.0.1xx

PullRequests

Created

  • Blazor AOT Publish Tests #22477
    Area-Infrastructure, Area-AspNetCore
  • Add disable build server CLI option #22472
    Area-CLI
  • Ensure references added using "Reference" are correctly copied in BlazorWASM projects #22470
    Area-AspNetCore
  • Update the target framework for the test projects #22460
    Area-Infrastructure

Merged

  • Add tool install implicit RIDs #22331
    Area-Tools
  • Re-enable a couple of old tests that were left disabled. #22381
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [Razor] Unskip Build_WithCustomOutputPath_Works #22463
    Area-AspNetCore

Updated

  • Update build.yml #22361
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Cleanup NoWarn duplication by moving its handling to the Suppression Engine #22426
    Area-Compatibility

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-11-04
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • GetSymbolInfo for InvocationExpressionSyntax fails with OverloadResolutionFailure #57590
  • Source Generators: RegisterReferenceSourceOutput #57589
  • Provide Linq evaluation of collections in Immediate window and Quick Watch #57585
  • CS1666 when creating a span from a stack-only buffer #57583
  • Visual Basic: Consider tracking AbstractFlowPass.PendingBranches by label #57580
    Backlog
  • Allow AnalyzeDataFlow for ConstructorInitializerSyntax #57577
  • AnalyzeDataFlow fails for InitializerExpressionSyntax if it is a child of an ArrayCreationExpressionSyntax #57572
    17.1
  • UseExpressionBodyCodeFixProvider crashes in top level statements #57570
    17.1

Closed

  • Improper precedence of or operator in combination with not in pattern matching? #57575
    17.1
  • Add global using as quick action. #57452
  • Incorrect nullability warnings for new interpolated string handlers #57528
    17.1
  • Documentation recommends inefficient way to read file. #57492
  • Roslyn fails to detect nullability problems in C# 10 interpolated string handlers #57412
    17.1

PullRequests

Created

  • Only run Spanish CI leg on LOC PRs #57591
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [LSP]Re-enable information level logging in loghub now that VS supports de… #57588
    Area-IDE
  • Do not run spanish unless it is a loc pr #57587
    Area-Infrastructure
  • reduce number of test legs we have to match a pairwise test approach #57586
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Re-enable BuildWithCommandLine test #57584
    Area-Infrastructure, Test
  • Clean up VsCodeWindowManager #57582
    Area-IDE
  • Use DocumentOptionSet in AutomaticLineEnderCommandHandler #57579
    Area-IDE
  • Make it possible to analyze the dataflow of `ConstructorInitializerSyntax ` #57576
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Bump dependencies and version for GA #57573
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Don't crash Use ExpressionBody on local functions in top level statements #57571
    Area-IDE
  • Add nullable attributes to Cocoa project explicitly #57569
    Area-IDE
  • Format list patterns #57568
    Area-Compilers
  • Target executable projects and remote workspaces to net6.0 #57567
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #57566
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge

Merged

  • Merge release/dev17.1-vs-deps to main-vs-deps #57562
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.0-vs-deps to main #57581
    auto-merge, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.0-vs-deps to release/dev17.0 #57578
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Allow us to dispose batches asynchronously #57421
    Area-IDE, Next

Updated

  • Fix generator caching in compiler server #57177
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Source Generators
  • Track AbstractFlowPass.PendingBranches by label #57520
    Area-Compilers
  • Interpolated string handlers in the CFG #57483
    Area-Compilers
  • Fix for "Function pointer invocation has "None" IOperation" #57191
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Adjust the order of evaluation for implicit Index/Range support to follow the recent LDM decision. #57535
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Range
  • Synthesize delegate types for lambdas with parameter types or return type that are not valid type arguments #57295
    Area-Compilers
  • Update the progress API shape to make it easier to mark a set of work as complete. #57547
    Area-IDE
  • Have navto only search generated-documents after doing the search of regular documents. #57538
    Area-IDE
  • proposed document pull diagnostics implementation #57518
    Area-IDE
  • Merge release/dev17.0 to release/dev17.1 #57561
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge release/dev17.0 to release/dev17.0-vs-deps #57563
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • StackFrame Parser/Lexer as EmbeddedLanguage #56957
    Area-IDE
  • Switch to 1ES R&D pools on main #57481
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Validate the checksum of source on disk #57541
    Area-IDE
  • Slice value is always assumed to be not null #57457
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Benchmark for Inheritance Margin #57445
    Area-IDE
  • Enable dumps for hung tests #57549
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Fix line delta calculation for top-level code #57556
    Area-Interactive

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-11-04
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Dynamically managed authentication / authorization #38099
  • Blazor Binding to multiple instances of a nested component causes bindings to mix up #38089
  • MultiplexEcho test failure #38087
  • LoggingConnectionMiddlewareCanBeAddedBeforeAndAfterHttps test failure #38086
  • Parameterize Blazor virtualization ItemProvider #38085
  • SignalR TypeScript Client -HubConnectionBuilder - ILogger is not replaced when using build() #38084
    .NET 7 Planning
  • Azure AD Authentication Error with Blazor wasm #38082
    .NET 7 Planning
  • Blazor Add Analyzer if JSInvokable Method isn't Public #38080
    Backlog
  • SignalR-Client-Cpp can end in deadlock after stop is called (typically seen in linux builds) #38078
    .NET 7 Planning

Closed

  • Stop Building Components/E2E tests in the main pipeline #38090
    6.0-docs-infra
  • HubMethodNameAttribute not used from interface in strongly typed hubs #38100
  • Identity SignInManager don't check SupportsUserLockout #37575
    7.0-preview1
  • Investigate `aspnetcore-components-e2e` Pipeline #37888
    6.0-docs-infra
  • Content Security Policy blocks script execution in default template. #37992
  • RoleStore.SaveChanges(CancellationToken cancellationToken) should be protected #37842
    7.0-preview1
  • ImageDisplay component sample #37016
    6.0-docs-infra
  • Document usage of `InputFile` when displaying images #36991
    6.0-docs-infra
  • Reconsider EditorForAsync/DisplayForAsync for ASP.NET 7 #38043
  • VS2022 RC2 Blazor exception handling issues #37849
  • Change visibility of IRemoteAuthenticationPathsProvider in Blazor WebAssembly to implement custom OAuth2 #38048
  • Razor Component Re-renders when no trigger conditions are met #38083
  • VS 2022 Preview 7, Asp.net 6, New Blazor Server Project with Periods in Project Name Fails to Build #38074
  • Server.IISIntegration.AuthenticationHandler is internal, while Authentication.Negotiate.NegotiateHandler is not #34637
    Backlog
  • FileNotFoundException: Could not find file 'D:\home\site\wwwroot\obj'. #37903
  • Blazor Service Worker Asset Manifest path construction bug #25959
    6.0-docs-infra
  • Blazor wasm size reduction #38071
  • Blazor Server-Side: Render Component via JavaScript #13766
    Backlog

PullRequests

Created

  • [DO NOT MERGE] Get non-crossgen'd builds #38098
    area-infrastructure
  • Unquarantine RedisEndToEnd tests #38095
    area-signalr
  • Remove SocketException usage #38094
    area-runtime
  • [release/6.0] Improve exception messages referencing startup code #38093
    Servicing-consider, area-security, 6.0.x
  • Fix EmptyBodyBehavior with empty content-type #38092
    area-mvc, feature-Model-Binding
  • Quarantine recently failing tests #38088
    area-runtime

Merged

  • Stop Building Components/E2E tests in the main pipeline #38091
    area-infrastructure, area-blazor, 7.0-preview1
  • Guard access failed calls #38068
    area-identity, 7.0-preview1
  • [release/2.1] Allow Hosting Bundle to be upgraded by MU #38042
    Servicing-approved, area-infrastructure, feature-installers, 2.1.31
  • Remove MinimalSampleFSharp.fsproj from sln #32144
    area-infrastructure, 7.0-preview1
  • Make RoleStore protected virtual #38061
    area-identity, 7.0-preview1

Updated

  • Add Components E2E Test Execution Instructions #38073
    Docs, area-blazor
  • Fix groupIdentity in protobuf template #37919
    Servicing-approved, area-mvc, 6.0.1
  • Improve exception messages referencing startup code #38045
    area-security
  • Update RazorPage template to be able to be SxS with previous version #34598
    area-mvc, 6.0.x
  • [release/3.1] Allow Hosting Bundle to be upgraded by MU #37969
    Servicing-approved, area-infrastructure, 3.1.22
  • [release/5.0] Allow Hosting Bundle to be upgraded by MU #37968
    Servicing-approved, area-infrastructure, 5.0.13
  • [release/6.0] Allow Hosting Bundle to be upgraded by MU #37967
    Servicing-approved, area-infrastructure, 6.0.1
  • Allow Hosting Bundle to be upgraded by MU #37966
    area-runtime
  • Warn that UseStartup/Configure/ConfigureWebHost not supported on WebApplicationBuilder #35884
    community-contribution, area-web-frameworks
  • Use the RawConnectionId for HttpSys #38059
    Servicing-approved, area-runtime, 6.0.1
  • Add WebApi-CSharp Template Toggle Description (#37367) #38062
    Servicing-approved, area-web-frameworks, 6.0.1
  • Use file scoped namespaces #38076
    area-infrastructure

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-11-04
entry.content:
Issues

Created

Closed

PullRequests

Created

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-11-04
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Evolve null-checking approach in SQLite provider #26535

Merged

Updated

  • [6.0.1] Avoid NRE in ForeignKeyAttributeConvention #26520

entry.title: dotnet/installer - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-11-04
entry.content:
Issues

Closed

  • Stray quote in installer #12241
  • .NET 6.0.100-rc.2.21505.57 installation location is missing on installation wizard within a clean Windows OS #12283

Updated

  • Installer URLs are pointing to blob storage #7460
  • Build failed: Validate-DotNet/main real signed, installer, .NET 7.0.1xx SDK, validation-installer-.NET 7.0.1xx SDK #installer-108968-.NET7.0.1xxSDK #11997

PullRequests

Created

  • Update runtime daily build link #12606
  • Update the uninstall orientation on the radio buttons #12605
  • Resolve Component Governance alerts #12604

Merged

  • Remove install location from Windows conclusion #12401
  • We keep getting this config file added by the insertion pipeline and it fails the build. #12554

Updated

  • We previously didn't run tests on arm64 #12486
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.1xx' => 'main' #12602
  • GetRuntimeInformation.targets: determine PortableProductMonikerRid based on OSName and Architecture. #12516
  • Bundle workload manifests as separate MSIs #12600
